value.title: POWERFUL storytelling technique in Power BI from STORYTELLING BY DATA book
value.excerpt: Have you read the book storytelling by data? It shows powerful techniques to grab the attention of the reader and convey insights faster and more effective, but how do we do that in Power BI?   Click play and let me show you!:)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
